name: Anya Sharma

background.education: B.S. Computer Science, University of California, Berkeley (2021)

resumeText: Highly motivated Software Engineer with 3 years of experience developing and deploying scalable web applications. Currently specializing in backend services using Python and Node.js within an AWS environment. At TechSolutions Inc., I led the migration of three legacy APIs to serverless architecture (AWS Lambda), resulting in a 25% reduction in operational costs. Proficient in full development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, testing (unit and integration), and CI/CD pipeline management using Jenkins and Docker. Seeking a challenging Mid-Level role where I can leverage my expertise in distributed systems and cloud infrastructure to drive product innovation. Strong collaborator in Agile teams, focused on delivering clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
situation: I feel stagnant in my current role and am looking for a company with a stronger focus on cutting-edge cloud technology. I've been actively applying (mass applying) to about 30 different mid-sized tech firms in the Bay Area over the last month, focusing on roles that offer more complex system design challenges. I need to polish my technical deep-dive and behavioral responses before my next round of onsite interviews.
feedbackStyle: I prefer structured feedback that highlights specific areas for improvement, especially regarding technical accuracy and optimal solution paths. I'll briefly note what worked well, but focus mostly on actionable steps.
